title: Murder & Mochas
description: Kurt West always has a hard time getting green alien blood out of his clothes. At least the diplomatâ€™s blood was blue.Kurt is a bounty hunter living in a small southern town, but when an alien diplomat is murdered on the street, Kurt is contracted to use his knowledge of the alien underground to track down the murderer. Even though his bail bondsman boss is breathing down his neck to bring in a bail jumper before he loses the business, Kurt must find the killer or Earth risks losing the protection that keeps a dangerous flood of aliens at bay.A Southern noir sci-fi detective story, Murder & Mochas bounces a sarcastic and gritty detective off aliens and life in a small southern town to produce a fun, page-turning mystery
author: Rhett Bigler
